alert.note: Alert for Blackford; Jay (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 7:14PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN BLACKFORD AND SOUTHWESTERN JAY COUNTIES THROUGH 745 PM EDT... At 714 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Pennville to near Dunkirk. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Dunkirk, Redkey, Pennville, Center, Mill Grove, Como, Boundary City, Blaine, Collett, Bluff Point, Powers, Trenton, and New Mount Pleasant. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
